name: Buzzmart
tag_list: ecommerce, marketplace, auctions, buy, sell, trading, social-marketplace
overview:
Buzzmart is a global marketplace that allows users to buy and sell their products either as auctions or fixed price listings, without any fees, commissions or ads.

Buzzmart has the vision of changing the way people buy and sell over the internet. With the rising popularity of social networking, viral videos and ecommerce sales, we at Buzzmart came up with the idea of creating a truly social marketplace where communication is transparent, trading is interactive, whilst also being able to connect through Buzzmart with other existing social networks. Launched in 2011 its has been steadily growing on popularity.

Buzzmart stands out from traditional online marketplaces with a variety of unique social features provided to our users such as videos to accommodate listings, live chat between buyer and seller, an ecommeroce micro-blogging facility, eBay listing import tool and a commenting system on listings to allow our buyers to gain as much information as possible about their purchases before they buy and improve trust amongst sellers.
